name: ELK-Stack
description: The ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) is a powerful open-source platform for searching, analyzing, and visualizing log data in real time. Elasticsearch provides distributed search and analytics, Logstash collects and processes data, and Kibana offers interactive visualization and exploration.

notes.text: Installation downloads ~2GB of packages and takes 10-20 minutes. Please be patient!
Interactive prompts will ask for SSL configuration (Full HTTPS/Backend only/No SSL) and memory settings during installation.
After installation, retrieve credentials with: pct exec CONTAINER_ID -- cat /root/elk-credentials.txt
Default heap sizes: Elasticsearch 2GB, Logstash 1GB. Configurable during installation.
Unique elastic password generated, API keys created for Kibana and Logstash, SSL certificates auto-configured based on your choices.
